description: A twist on the normal chocolate chip biscuits by adding raspberries and lollies.
name: Raspberry choc chip biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roll into small balls and place on trays. Cook for about 15 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on the tray for a couple of minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
